## Greetings!

Think of your personal space as a folder of storing all the documents that don't currently belong anywhere else. It's all yours. Customize this page by clicking the edit button ![image](https://confluence.atlassian.com/images/icons/edit_pencil.png) on top.

## What's inside this space?

[Sample Pages](/wiki/spaces/~62d50427d1bb05497b0128f1/pages/3512205545/Sample+Pages)

- Meeting notes
- Decision
- Product requirements

## Out of Scope

List the features discussed which are out of scope or might be revisited in a later release.

-

AFG Discount Decision Roadmap:

●       Finalizing the list of items to go on sale (1 week prior to finalizing decision sale items list should be  ready)

○       Get Phase Calendar from client

○       Get YTR lines and next season’s orders from the client

Details:

If the information of YTR lines does not reach automatically, it is requested manually.

Action:

Lines labeled as ytr by the customer, if shared manually with an excel file, will be added to a table by truncate insert operation and the markdown.SaleLines table will be updated with the help of this table.

○       The filtering of items belonging to some Business Units(Dept) requested by the customer(For WN22: T97 items are excluded.)

Action:

This filtering can be accomplished by adding a simple update line to the

*report.SaleLines_Report_Canberk* stored procedure that provides data to the SaleLines table.

metadata.title: Preprocessing Part of Preparing Sale List Report

content:
o the

*report.SaleLines_Report_Canberk* stored procedure that provides data to the SaleLines table.

Note: The update operation mentioned above should not be done for the one-time SaleLines table. Because this report is updated by the daily store procedure(report.SaleLines_Report_Canberk) with truncate insert operation.

○       Checking whether the data in the SaleLines report is up-to-date

Action:

Columns containing Continuous values (Original Price, Total Stock Value etc.) in the Sale Lines report should be compared with the values in the markdown.WeeklyPastData table and manually checked for accuracy.

○       Checking the consistency of OnSale, Reason and flag columns in the SaleLines report

Details:

Flag columns: IsNoFirstSales, IsYTR, IsFutureOrder, IsBroken, Is90+AndNotCore, IsDiscounted, IsNoStock, IsParent/ChildItem

Action:

metadata.title: Preprocessing Part of Preparing Sale List Report

content:
sYTR, IsFutureOrder, IsBroken, Is90+AndNotCore, IsDiscounted, IsNoStock, IsParent/ChildItem

Action:

By checking the historical data of the items selected from the list, the information in the flag columns and the consistency of the decision made as a result of this information are checked.

○       Prepare a preliminary list with specified rules (2-3 days)

■    report.SetScenarioItemParameters

■    report.SetScenarioWeeklyRateConstraints

○       Prepare SaleItems list

■     [https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JXvVfOTPRp1XWBVAWVq07ERre3y-HTjt/edit#gid=1874027367](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JXvVfOTPRp1XWBVAWVq07ERre3y-HTjt/edit#gid=1874027367)

■     report.PrepareSaleLines

○       Client reviews and revises the lists (1 week). Shares final list via Excel

●       Finalize decisions (around 3-4 weeks prior to sale start)

Final decisions should be made with the previously decided sale items list.

○       After client shares final sale lines exec:

metadata.title: Preprocessing Part of Preparing Sale List Report

content:
ade with the previously decided sale items list.

○       After client shares final sale lines exec:

■       report.SetScenarioItemParameters_AfterLineFinalization

■       report.SetScenarioWeeklyRateConstraints

○       Analyze run results internally and with client

■       report.CreateRunControlMaster

■       report.GetRunDetail

○       Inspect ST, MD KPIs against the targets and last year’s sales

○       Revise decisions (2-3 days)

○       Prepare Sale Lists

■       Sale Lists are shared within AFG. Should include all items whose prices are changed

■       [https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1oYnJD3oqvG92ri5Vwla015ZRq5SgFn3l](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/0/folders/1oYnJD3oqvG92ri5Vwla015ZRq5SgFn3l)

■       report.PrepareSaleLists

■       report.PrepareSaleListsSA (KSA’s lists should be at article level)

○       Prepare Municipality Lists

metadata.title: Preprocessing Part of Preparing Sale List Report

content:
port.PrepareSaleListsSA (KSA’s lists should be at article level)

○       Prepare Municipality Lists

■       Municipality Lists are shared with local authorities. Price decisions shared in municipality lists should include only the items whose discounts are within Phase discount limits.

●    E.g If Phase 1 discount limits are 30%-50% then items with discount 55% should not be included.

■       report.MunicipalityListFormat

■       Municipality list is not required for Egypt

■       KSA and KW municipality list are not prepared by Invent

○       Prepare Sale Proposal and Markdown By Age Reports

■       Markdown Summary

■       report.MarkdownSummaryByAgeForAllPhasesRevisedV2

■       [https://tableau.inventanalytics.com/#/site/AlFuttaim/workbooks/4759/views](https://tableau.inventanalytics.com/#/site/AlFuttaim/workbooks/4759/views)

■       Sale Proposal

■       report.MarkdownForecast
